infotexts.entitydescription.nightgoggles: Standard issue Coalition Night Vision Goggles. Requires Batteries.
infotexts.entitydescription.eyeglasses: These unregistered prescription glasses may improve patient's vision.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes: Right out of a human's skull. Used for transplants.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_monste: Right out of a monster's skull. Not great for seeing things, but useful in crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_terror: An eye-like object that is unbeknownst to humanity. Proceed with caution.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_husk: Right out of a husk's skull. Cannot be damaged by water, improves your skills, and has a small chance to give you husk infection.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_bionic: A metal, much more resistant eye, made for transplantation. Improves vision quality.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_night: A pair of eyes, but with night vision implants.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_infrar: A pair of eyes, but with infrared implants. Slightly improves combat skill.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_plasti: A pair of "eyes" Not much better than being blind. While you can't see with them, at least they make you look fashionable.
infotexts.entitydescription.muscleconnectors: Used in eye transplants. Use before putting in the eye, along with eye gel.
infotexts.entitydescription.eyedrops: Use on the eyes to make them recover quicker.
infotexts.entitydescription.eyegel: Used in eye transplants. Use before putting in the eye, along with muscle connectors.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.noeye: The patient's eyes are gone, with empty, red holes being there instead.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyedamage: The patient's eyes look flat, and they have trouble seeing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyeshock: The patient's immune system did not accept the eye, and it is attacking it instead. Eye removal is required to stop it.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyedrop: The patient's eye healing rate has increased.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyemuscle: Muscle connectors are attached to patiens eye holes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyegell: Eye gel is applied to patients eye holes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyeone: The patient has lost all vision in one of the eyes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyesickness: The patient has trouble seeing, likely because of a recent eye transplant. This should clear itself up in a matter of minutes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyecataract: The patient's eyes look cloudy, and their vision is blurred. Eye surgery recommended.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyenight: The patient has night vision eyes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyeterror: You feel a comforting sense of bloodlust and strength. You are more resilient. You are alive.
